oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cases of bottled water distributed by the Office of Emergency Management in the aftermath of the May 2010 flood
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of cases of bottled water during the May 2010 flood in Nashville. The Office of Emergency Management distributed 13.2 million bottles of drinking water at 6 locations from May 3 to May 28 with help from Hands on Nashville, Metro Health Department, and Metro Schools transportation personnel.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Metropolitan Nashville and Davidson County Office of Emergency Management
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Harris, Scott (Photographer); Metropolitan Nashville and Davidson County Office Of Emergency Management
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219
